templates.title: Stalwart Mail
templates.name: stalwart-mail
templates.description: Stalwart Mail Server is an open-source mail server solution with JMAP, IMAP4, POP3, and SMTP support and a wide range of modern features. It is written in Rust and designed to be secure, fast, robust and scalable.
templates.note: Secure & Modern All-in-One Mail Server (IMAP, JMAP, POP3, SMTP) üõ°Ô∏è
